meanings.definition: The quality or state of being exclusive.
meanings.sent1: The exclusivenesses of the VIP section made everyone feel special.
meanings.sent2: The exclusivenesses of the club membership required a strict dress code.
meanings.sent3: The exclusivenesses of the secret club made it feel like a hidden treasure.
meanings.sent4: The exclusivenesses of the elite group was like a golden key to success.
meanings.sent5: The exclusivenesses of the private event made it unforgettable.

meanings.definition: The condition of being limited to a particular group or category.
meanings.sent1: The exclusivenesses of the scholarship program ensured only the brightest students were selected.
meanings.sent2: The exclusivenesses of the exclusive club meant only members could enter.
meanings.sent3: The exclusivenesses of the rare flower species made it a sought-after prize.
meanings.sent4: The exclusivenesses of the top-tier athletes set them apart from the rest.
meanings.sent5: The exclusivenesses of the luxury brand made it highly desirable.
